Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.network.messages

Class CharacterCardNetworkParamSet

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.network.messages.CharacterCardNetworkParamSet
public class CharacterCardNetworkParamSet extends Object
Class CharacterCardNetworkParamSet represent the set of Character Card parameters which will be sent over the network

  • Field Details

    • srcStudentColor

      private final Student srcStudentColor
      The student color that needs to be moved, or the student that will be ignored when computing the Influence

    • dstStudentColor

      private final Student dstStudentColor
      The student color that needs to be swapped with srcStudentColor

    • studentDestinationIsSelf

      private final boolean studentDestinationIsSelf
      Whether the student destination is the card itself

    • chosenMotherNatureAdditionalSteps

      private final int chosenMotherNatureAdditionalSteps
      The number of additional stems MN has to move (set when the player first chooses it). Set it to -1 to signal a nil stepCount

    • sourceIslandIndex

      private final int sourceIslandIndex
      Used to get the StopCard back. Set it to -1 to signal a nil island

    • targetIslandIndex

      private final int targetIslandIndex
      Used to set the StopCard on an Island. Set it to -1 to signal a nil island

    • stopCardMovementMode

      private final CharacterCardParamSet.StopCardMovementMode stopCardMovementMode
      The direction the StopCard has to move

  • Constructor Details

    • CharacterCardNetworkParamSet

      public CharacterCardNetworkParamSet(Student srcStudentColor, Student dstStudentColor, boolean studentDestinationIsSelf, int chosenMotherNatureAdditionalSteps, int sourceIslandIndex, int targetIslandIndex, CharacterCardParamSet.StopCardMovementMode stopCardMovementMode)
      Creates a parameter set
      Parameters:
      srcStudentColor - The student color that needs to be moved, or the student that will be ignored when computing the Influence
      dstStudentColor - The student color that needs to be swapped with srcStudentColor
      studentDestinationIsSelf - Whether the student destination is the card itself
      chosenMotherNatureAdditionalSteps - The number of additional stems MN has to move (set when the player first chooses it). Set it to -1 to signal a nil stepCount
      sourceIslandIndex - Used to get the StopCard back. Set it to -1 to signal a nil island
      targetIslandIndex - Used to set the StopCard on an Island. Set it to -1 to signal a nil island
      stopCardMovementMode - The direction the StopCard has to move
